review.title: “great opportunity to work internationally”
review.pros: Pros – Talented team members who are passionate
review.cons: Cons – Senior management are not sensitive to mid management.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Respect your employees.

review.title: “Amazing colleagues, disappointing changes”
review.pros: Pros – So many of the program staff here are amazing people. They are hardworking and have substantial experience in international health and development. The work can be very interesting and fulfilling.
review.cons: Cons – I-TECH threw out the baby with the bathwater. The organization is beginning to feel the results of some poor leadership/management decisions.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – I'd put advice here, but you wouldn't follow it.

review.title: “Management has less experience than staff”
review.pros: Pros – The work at I-TECH is stimulating and there are many opportunities to work with people around the globe and feel that you are making a difference.
review.cons: Cons – After a process of re-organization that devalued the skills of the technical staff, a new hierarchical country-based management structure was put into place. This did not reflect skills or years of experience in global health. In fact, the director has little direct experience in global health.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Find a way to honor and value your technical staff that have the experience and skills that keep this organization running.
